QuestData.Title: Zeth'Gor Must Burn!
QuestData.Description: The Bleeding Hollow clan have betrayed their noble heritage! We, the orcs who fought and died to save ourselves from the fel taint of Mannoroth, look upon our vile cousins and see only weakness and ignobility... and for that, they must burn!$B$BEnter Zeth'Gor, their bastion to the east, and burn their buildings. Kill peons for their torches, ignite them at their forge, and hurl the burning torches at their hovels, their stable and their barracks. Burn them all, and then return to me!$B$BFor the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Bleeding Hollow Peons for their torches, ignite them at Zeth'Gor's forge then throw the burning torches at Zeth'Gor Buildings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Zeth'Gor must burn, $N! Speak with me again when your task is complete.
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! I could see the smoke and flames of Zeth'Gor from here! May the Bleeding Hollow fiends burn to ash and drift far from the sight of any true orc!$B$BThank you, $N. You helped burn away an afront to every orc's spirit.
